title: [CLIENT] Saved rune pages gone after every relog! Unable to save rune pages!
body:
So the runes reforged system worked flawlessly for weeks, but since christmas I cannot save rune pages anymore and they just disappear after each relog. Only the presets are selectable. I had 18/18 rune pages saved that, on christmas, suddenly disappeared.

I tried initiating a full repair. No luck.

**Reproducing steps:**

(0. Wait for christmas eve)

1. Log In to the client.
2. Create and save a rune page.
3. Log Out of the client.
4. Log back In.
5. Notice that your custom rune pages are gone and only the presets are selectable.


**Frequency:** Currently 100% occurence each relog.

If you experience the same issue, please upvote for visibility.

replies.body: Same problem here, everything worked normally until today i logged in just to find my runes gone.
had this problem, went through all the hassle of clean install and full repair as well as opening all the ports in my modem . worked well for a while but now it's back

Sounds like you're not connecting properly to something. :/ 

- Is your internet connection strong and stable? 
- Can you change & save settings?

EDIT: How long did you have your custom pages before they disappeared?

yes, I have the highest package my internet provider offers. (200 MBit/s)

I can change settings for the current session. It gives me an error stating that "there was an error setting your rune page", but I am able to use it in the match. However, after a relog the rune page is gone again and I am left with just the presets.

I added more and more rune pages since the start of runes reforged and was playing with 18/18 several days. They disappeared yesterday and it all (the error) started.

**Edit (Posts merged)**
**#1: **
Additionally, I am also unable to go into my emote menu. It gives me the following error.

> "Sorry! Something went wrong with your emote wheel. Please try again later, or 
> contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM01"


Maybe it is also of help: I realize the errors started happening shortly after I opened the level 40 loot capsule from which the level 40 emote is automatically placed into your emote wheel.

**#2:**
New info: I tried solving the issue with the DNS / IP solutions via the troubleshooting page. No change. It still won't save my rune reforged pages and after I applied the DNS solution the emote wheel menu now additionally gives me the error code EM05 to my previous error EM01.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sparkle,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GiRfERpj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-26T16:59:07.983+0000)
>
> Sounds like you're not connecting properly to something. :/ 
> 
> - Is your internet connection strong and stable? 
> - Can you change & save settings?
> 
> EDIT: How long did you have your custom pages before they disappeared?

I have this problem, too. Started with Kaisa's release for me, so more recent. 100% reliability on losing custom pages each time the client is closed.

I have the same problem.
Please fix it!

Same problem here 
it's really annoying

> [{quoted}](name=NekRes,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GiRfERpj,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-12-26T15:01:26.640+0000)
>
> So the runes reforged system worked flawlessly for weeks, but since christmas I cannot save rune pages anymore and they just disappear after each relog. Only the presets are selectable. I had 18/18 rune pages saved that, on christmas, suddenly disappeared.
> 
> I tried initiating a full repair. No luck.
> 
> **Reproducing steps:**
> 
> (0. Wait for christmas eve)
> 
> 1. Log In to the client.
> 2. Create and save a rune page.
> 3. Log Out of the client.
> 4. Log back In.
> 5. Notice that your custom rune pages are gone and only the presets are selectable.
> 
> 
> **Frequency:** Currently 100% occurence each relog.
> 
> If you experience the same issue, please upvote for visibility.

same problem here, from patch 9.7 to 9.13 (the current one) i got to manually reset rune pages and Summoner's spell every log in

I've skadoodled around entire google to posts like this, relating to this very issue. It boggles me that it was never addressed except for this thread. And the response isn't really that helpful neither. It's my first month in League and I'm not fast enough to set up runes on the fly when the match starts so I wish to keep two for my current mains.

Every time I relog, the runes are gone, and I have to set them up again before the game starts. It's frustrating.

I don't know if that's related, but another thing which happens(which is kind of similar issue) is "Disable Login Animations" is always unchecked when I open up the launcher. 

Are the rune and login animation configs stored locally? If so, where? It is possible that I have something related to admin permissions or read only in there. Or maybe it's trying to access something what doesn't exist.

Thank you for understanding and sorry for the bump. I explained why I bumped on the first paragraph.

Edit: The issue was fixed after a patch it seems. Yay!

+1 same error for me, on EUW servers, was working with 20/20 custom runes pages, and suddenly i got the same problem than you, and since it still bugged... I've sent some bug reports to Riot, the last one i said to them to at least answer me with some "trying to fix" guides, because i'm analyst programmer, so going into league of legends filesystem to try something to help is not a problem to me. But, as usual on this issue, no answer at all from Riot...
This issue still remains. After re login all custom page are gone.
same thing here i want it fixed

I don't wanna be 'that guy' but the rune system basically just requires you to have 1 rune page that you change every game. Having multiple rune pages (in addition to the stupid default one Riot won't let us remove) is actually just a hassle.
